mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE seat_id = #{seatId} AND ( (reservation_in_time < #{endTime} AND reservation_out_time > #{startTime}) ) AND status IN ('pending', 'active') ORDER BY reservation_in_time
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND reservation_in_time >= NOW() AND status IN ('pending', 'active') ORDER BY reservation_in_time ASC
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(reservation_in_time) = CURDATE() ORDER BY reservation_in_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE DATE(reservation_in_time) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE DATE(reservation_in_time) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE status = 'no_show' OR reservation_status = '违约'

SELECT DATE(reservation_in_time) AS date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservations WHERE DATE(reservation_in_time) BETWEEN DATE(#{startDate}) AND DATE(#{endDate}) GROUP BY DATE(reservation_in_time) ORDER BY DATE(reservation_in_time)
